00005 Find and load the openssl necessary compilation and link flags
00006 """
00007 
00008 def exists(env):
00009         return true
00010 
00011 def generate(env):
00012         if not env['HELP'] and (env['_CONFIGURE_'] or not env.has_key('CACHED_OPENSSL')):
00013                 from SCons.Tool import Tool
00014                 import os
00015                 pkgs = Tool('pkgconfig', ['./bksys'])
00016                 pkgs.generate(env)
00017 
00018                 # TODO this will not work on opensuse 10 (ita) openssl-devel not installed
00019                 have_openssl = env.pkgConfig_findPackage('OPENSSL', 'openssl', '0.9.6')
00020 
00021                 dest=open(env.join(env['_BUILDDIR_'], 'ksslconfig.h'), 'w')
00022                 dest.write('/* openssl configuration */\n')
00023                 if have_openssl: dest.write('#define KSSL_HAVE_SSL 1\n');
00024                 dest.close()
00025                 #env['_CONFIG_H_'].append('openssl')
